channel.title: Behavioral Science on The Approximate Mind
channel.description: Recent content in Behavioral Science on The Approximate Mind

item.title: The Approximate Mind, Part 4: How Close Can We Actually Get?
item.description: After three articles exploring how AI approaches understanding, through confidence calibration, context-aware reasoning, and the limits imposed by human irrationality, there’s an obvious question: How close can cutting-edge AI actually get?
